Interface RegistrationServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegistrationController
public interface RegistrationServiceInterface
Interface for user registration services.

This interface defines the contract for user registration and approval operations, decoupling the registration logic from its implementation.

Responsibilities:

  • Register new Company Representatives
  • Approve/reject Company Representative accounts
  • Manage password changes
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • registerCompanyRepresentative

      boolean registerCompanyRepresentative(String name, String email, String companyName, String department, String position, String password)
      Registers a new Company Representative.
      Parameters:
      name - representative's name
      email - company email (used as User ID)
      companyName - name of the company
      department - department within company
      position - job position
      password - initial password
      Returns:
      true if registration successful, false otherwise

    • approveRepresentative

      boolean approveRepresentative(CareerCenterStaff staff, CompanyRepresentative rep)
      Approves a pending Company Representative account.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member performing the approval
      rep - the representative to approve
      Returns:
      true if approval successful, false otherwise

    • rejectRepresentative

      boolean rejectRepresentative(CareerCenterStaff staff, CompanyRepresentative rep)
      Rejects a pending Company Representative account.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member performing the rejection
      rep - the representative to reject
      Returns:
      true if rejection successful, false otherwise

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(String userId, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID (student ID or email for company representatives)
      oldPassword - current password for verification
      newPassword - new password to set
      Returns:
      true if password changed successfully, false otherwise

    • setUsers

      void setUsers(List<User> users)
      Sets the user repository for registration operations.
      Parameters:
      users - the list of users

    • getRepresentatives

      List<CompanyRepresentative> getRepresentatives()
      Gets all registered Company Representatives.
      Returns:
      list of all Company Representatives
